title: LIVESTREAM - Oceania Preseason Tournament brought to you by Pacific Peninsula
body:
Dear Summoners,

---------------- - - - - 


#The **Oceania Preseason Tournament** tonight at 6pm AEST is going to be **LIVE on twitch!**
- 
If you wish to watch the tournament, watch it here: http://www.twitch.tv/PacificPeninsula
------




Cheers and goodluck to all participants

bollockz

replies.body: Thanks for hosting the tournament bollockz. Was loads of fun even though my team bobgu didn't make it into the finals.

Sounds alright. Might pop by some time to see what it's all about!

edit: Alright, you got me! There's a 100% chance I'll show up.
